title: Black Saree Portrait
prompt: Turn this photo into 'Create a retro, vintage-inspired image grainy yet bright - based on the reference picture. The girl should be draped in a perfect black, Pinterest-style aesthetic retro saree. The vibe must capture the essence of a 90s movie brown-longhaired baddie, with wavy curls and a small flower tucked visibly into her hair, enhanced by a windy, romantic atmosphere. She stands against a solid wall, where deep shadows and dramatic contrasts add mystery and artistry to the scene, creating a moody yet enchanting cinematic effect.'

title: Lavender Saree Portrait
prompt: Create a retro, vintage-inspired image - grainy yet bright - based on the reference picture. The girl should be draped in a perfect lavender chiffon, Pinterest-style aesthetic saree. The vibe must capture the essence of a 90s movie dark-brown-longhaired baddie, with silky hair and a small flower tucked visibly into her hair, enhanced by a windy, romantic atmosphere. She is standing against an old wooden door, where deep shadows and dramatic contrasts add mystery and artistry to the scene, creating a moody yet enchanting cinematic effect. Her pose should suggest that she is adjusting her hair.
